titleStmt.title: Rules and articles of war, for the better government of his Majesties army in the kingdom of Scotland. Published by his Majesties command.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Army.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to his most sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Order to print dated: Given at Our Court, at White-hall the 22 day of April, 1686. And of Our Reign the second year.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
